venue.name: Microsoft New England Research & Development Center (NERD)

item.description:
First Boston Tech Meetup under new management! Join us at Microsoft NERD to see what's new and cool on the local tech startup scene. Doors open at 7, presentations run from 7:30-8:30.

Here's the lineup:

NetBlazr - alternate source broadband
Blogcastr - a liveblogging service
Muckrock - government transparency and accountability
Relay Technology - works with emerging biopharma tech
iCreate to Educate - helps teachers to integrate technology in the classroom
Abroad101 - review and rate study-abroad programs
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the Paul-Sampson combo room on the 1st floor.
item.name: January 2011 Tech Meetup
